last_episode_to_air.name: Moments of Transition
last_episode_to_air.overview: In the post-Soviet world, the Castros find mutual support in Venezuela, but the Cold War's conclusion brings the country's isolationism to an end.

name: The Cuba Libre Story
overview: Recounts the tumultuous history of Cuba, a nation of foreign conquest, freedom fighters and Cold War political machinations.

seasons.name: Miniseries
seasons.overview: Their island nation has been invaded, ransacked and enslaved - but the people of Cuba have never been conquered.

episodes.name: Breaking Chains
episodes.overview: After four centuries of Spanish colonial rule, Cubans win their independence, but U.S. intervention at the eleventh hour comes with a price.

episodes.name: War and Sugar
episodes.overview: Cuba flourishes thanks to sugar production, but relations with the U.S. deteriorate, leading to the rise of military strongman Fulgencio Batista.

episodes.name: Ganster's Paradise
episodes.overview: A source of illegal rum during Prohibition, Cuba becomes a haven for the Mafia, which seizes control of the country's popular gambling industry.

episodes.name: A Ragtag Revolution
episodes.overview: On New Year's Day 1959, rebel guerillas led by the Castro brothers and Che Guevara succeed in toppling the corrupt, dictatorial rule of Batista.

episodes.name: Making Heroes
episodes.overview: Heroes of the revolution include the Castros, Che Guevara and Camilo Cienfuegos, but Fidel Castro's brutality and radical leftist reforms divide them.

episodes.name: Of Soviets and Saviors
episodes.overview: When Fidel Castro expropriates U.S. businesses and pursues support from the Soviet Union, the CIA sends assassins, saboteurs and invaders to Cuba.

episodes.name: Secrets and Sacrifices
episodes.overview: Challenges mount in the '80s as Cubans desert their restrictive homeland, cocaine infiltrates the government, and European socialism collapses.

episodes.name: Moments of Transition
episodes.overview: In the post-Soviet world, the Castros find mutual support in Venezuela, but the Cold War's conclusion brings the country's isolationism to an end.

1.name: Miniseries
1.overview: Their island nation has been invaded, ransacked and enslaved - but the people of Cuba have never been conquered.
